prompt_bits.context: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a component-based architecture. Key concepts include JSX, virtual DOM, hooks, and one-way data flow.
best_practices: Use functional components with hooks over class components
Lift state up when needed, but prefer local state
Use PropTypes or TypeScript for type safety
common_mistakes: Mutating state directly instead of using setState
Not cleaning up effects (missing return in useEffect)
Creating too many re-renders with improper dependency arrays
Prop drilling instead of Context or state management

basic_component.description: Modern React functional component with hooks
